data.name: BatchRename
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Enable Batch Renaming Output Files</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Instead of keeping original file names as output image file names, you can also define your own rule to batch rename output files and files are saved.</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Basically the rule to generate file name is:</Run></Paragraph><List MarkerStyle="Disc"><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you specify prefix and/or suffix, the file name is prefix + auto increment number + suffix + extension.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If none of prefix or suffix is specified, the file name is the original file name + auto increment number + extension.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem></List></FlowDocument>

data.name: BatchRenameFileNameCase
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Batch Renaming File Name Case</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates the way</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="zh-cn" xml:space="preserve"> how application</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve"> handle</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="zh-cn">s</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve"> case of file name.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: BatchRenameNumberPadding
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Batch Renaming File Name Number Padding</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates how many digits of number to use as auto increment number. For example if you specify 3 as value, you get auto increment numbers like 001, 002, 003 and so on.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: BatchRenamePrefix
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Batch Renaming File Name Prefix</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Prefix of batch rename file name.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: BatchRenameStartNumber
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Batch Renaming File Name Starting Number</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates the starting number as auto increment number as part of the batch renamed file name.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: BatchRenameSuffix
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Batch Renaming File Name Suffix</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Suffix of batch rename file name.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: DestinationDirectory
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Destination Directory</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">This is the directory which will be used to save all processed image files.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: DropShadowBackgroundColor
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Drop Shadow Background Color</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you like to add a drop shadow to each output image file, there is an area outside main image and shadow part. This color will be used to fill in this blank.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: DropShadowColor
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Drop Shadow Color</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Color of drop shadow applied to all output images.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: DropShadowDepth
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Drop Shadow Depth</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates the depth of drop shadow. If the value is set to 0 the application will not add drop shadow to output images.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: DropShadowLocation
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Drop Shadow Location</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates the location (direction) of drop shadow.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: GenerateThumbnail
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Generate Thumbnail</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">By checking this checkbox, application will generate thumbnail image for each of the output image.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ImageBorderColor
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Image Border Color</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates the color of image border which will be applied to output images.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ImageBorderWidth
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Image Border Width</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you decide to add a border to all output images please specify the width of border you need. If border width is set to 0 no border will be added.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ImageEffect
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Image Effect</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Additional image effect applied to your selected image.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ImageFileList
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Image File List</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph Margin="0,0,0,13.33" TextAlignment="Left" FontFamily="Times New Roman" FontSize="14.6666666666667"><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="12.6666666666667" xml:lang="en-ca">This is the list with all the supported image files in the source directory you picked before. In this list you can check/uncheck each individual file to control which files to process.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: JpgCompressionRatio
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">JPG Compression Ratio</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If the processed files are in JPG format, you can specified the compression ratio for the output files. The higher ratio you set the better graphic quality and bigger file size.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: KeepExif
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Keep EXIF</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">By checking this checkbox, application will preserve the EXIF information from your original images. NOTE: this feature is only available to JPG file format.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: PreferenceApplicationSkin
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Application Skin</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Choose the skin of application.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: PreferenceDateTimeFormat
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Date Time Format for Watermark Text</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It is used to define how does the date time value(s) from Exif Marco (e.g. date time when photo was taken) look like in watermark text output.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ShrinkImage
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Shrink Image</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">By checking this checkbox, the application will shrink output images to your designated size.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ShrinkImageSize
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Shrink Image Size</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Here you can specify the expected new size of output images as long as the mode how to calculate new image size. There 3 modes you can choose:</Run></Paragraph><List MarkerStyle="Disc"><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">By Long Side</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve"> - application will take the new size entered by you and make it as the new image size of long side. For example if you have an image with resolution of 800 * 600 (wider image) and you input 400 as new size, the output image will have 400 * 300 as new resolution; if you have an image with resolution of 600 * 800 (taller image) and you input 400 as new size, the output image will have 300 * 400 as new resolution. The aspect ratio will be persisted in new image.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">By Width</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve"> - application will take the new size entered by you and make it as new image width. The aspect ratio will be persisted in new image.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">By Height</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve"> - application will take the new size entered by you and make it as new image height. The aspect ratio will be persisted in new image.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem></List><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Note</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve">: </Run></Paragraph><List MarkerStyle="Disc"><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If the entered new size of image in any of the choice above results image enlargement, the application will keep original image resolution.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If the entered new size of image is 0, the application will keep original image resolution.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem></List></FlowDocument>

data.name: SourceDirectory
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Source Directory</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">This is the directory which contains all the image files waiting to be processed.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ThumbnailFileNamePrefix
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Thumbnail Image File Name Prefix</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It is used as prefix of output thumbnail file name.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ThumbnailFileNameSuffix
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Thumbnail Image File Name Suffix</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It is used as suffix of output thumbnail file name.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: ThumbnailImageSize
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Thumbnail Image Size</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve">The size of thumbnail image, application uses "shrink by long side" algorithm to calculate the actual size of thumbnail. NOTE: is the size of thumbnail is set to 0, no thumbnail will be generated even the </Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Generate Thumbnail</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve"> checkbox is checked.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkDistanceToEdge
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Distance To Edge</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">This number indicates how far in pixels that watermark image/text away from edge of image. The logic to use this value in your watermark layout calculation is based on the position of watermark:</Run></Paragraph><List MarkerStyle="Disc"><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Bottom Center - Watermark will be placed x pixels above bottom edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Bottom Left - Watermark will be placed x pixels above bottom edge and x pixels right to left edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Bottom Right - Watermark will be placed x pixels above bottom edge and x pixels left to right edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Middle Center - This value won't take effect.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Middle Left - Watermark will be placed x pixels right to left edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Middle Right - Watermark will be placed x pixels left to right edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Top Center - Watermark will be placed x pixels below top edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Top Left - Watermark will be placed x pixels below top edge and x pixels right to left edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Top Right - Watermark will be placed x pixels below top edge and x pixels left to right edge.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem></List><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">In paragraphs above x means the Distance to Edge value you have selected or entered.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkImage
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Image</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you like to add image as watermark to your images, please pick your desired image here. If nothing is picked, the program will ignore the task to add image watermark.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkImageOpacity
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Image Opacity</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you like to have semi-transparent watermark image to add to your main image, you can specify the opacity (alpha) value here. 1 means no opacity, while 0 mean total transparent. If you set the opacity value to 0, the program will ignore the action to add watermark image.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkImagePosition
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Image Position</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates where to put image watermark on your main image. If no watermark image is not picked above, program will ignore the selection here.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkImagePreview
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Image Preview</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">This is the preview area of selected watermark image. If you are unsatisfied with your choice, you can click on the "</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Remove</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">" button on the right side to remove it. Note: once you remove the image watermark application will not put any image watermark on your main image.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkImageRotationAngle
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Image Rotation Angle</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you need to rotate your watermark image and then put it into your main image, please specify the angle here by dragging the slider.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkText
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you like to add text as watermark to your images, please enter your desired text here. If nothing is entered, the program will ignore the task to add text watermark.</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you need to break your text into multiple lines, simply press "Enter" at where you need a new line, the text box will automatically expand to fit your text.</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca" xml:space="preserve">Here you also can insert Exif macros </Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">and external text into watermark. See help icons on toolbar for details.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextAlignment
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text Alignment</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you have multiple lines of watermark text to put into your main image, you can specify the alignment here. For single line of watermark text you still can do so, but it won't affect any output.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextColor
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text Color</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">You can specify the color of your watermark here. The default value is semi transparent white. You can control the color and transparency (alpha value) in the color-picker window.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextExif
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:space="preserve">Exif Macro in </Run><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">Select the watermark text box below to enable the dropdown and button. Move cursor to your desired position in watermark text, select the macro you need and click "Insert Exif Tag" to include the macro in your current cursor location.</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:space="preserve">The macro basically is just a tag surrounded by "[[" and "]]" delimiters, feel free to use normal text editing mode to move them around or delete it.</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">You can add as many Exif macros as you need.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextExternalText
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:space="preserve">External Text in </Run><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">If you simply use watermark text box below, you get same texts to all the images within the project. This feature is designed to allow the images within same project could have different watermark texts.</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:space="preserve">This is done via an external controlling file. </Run></Paragraph><List MarkerStyle="Disc"><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">The controlling file should have same name of image file, for example, if the image file is named something.jpg then the controlling file must be something.txt. Each individual image file can have its own controlling file.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">Each controlling file is allowed to have any number of controlling tag - one tag one line.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem><ListItem><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:space="preserve">The tag line begins with "{{" following by a tag name, closed by "}}", after the tag name you can have any texts without line break. For example: </Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333"><Run.TextDecorations><TextDecoration Location="Underline" /></Run.TextDecorations>{{TagName1}} This is a piece of text</Run><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">.</Run></Paragraph></ListItem></List><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333">If you want to insert external text into your watermark, focus on text box below, move cursor to desire position and click "Insert External Text" button. It will give you an empty tag "{{}}". from there you are free to enter any tag defined in external controlling file described above.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextFont
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text Font</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Font you like to use as watermark text.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextPosition
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text Position</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">It indicates where to put text watermark on your main image. If no watermark text is not entered above, program will ignore the selection here.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextPreview
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text Preview</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Here you can preview the watermark text with combination of all the parameters (except for position) above.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>

data.name: WatermarkTextRotationAngle
data.value: <FlowDocument PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="True" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Verdana" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">Watermark Text Rotation Angle</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph><Run FontFamily="Calibri" FontSize="13.3333333333333" xml:lang="en-ca">If you like to rotate your watermark text and then put it into your main image, you can do it by dragging the slider.</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>
